email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 85,000 MT of coal from Richards Bay to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for reaching out. I can offer the vessel OCEAN BREEZE for this shipment. The freight quote is USD 25/MT. The vessel has a DWT of 92,000 and an LOA of 230m. The laycan is 20-25 April 2023. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 25/MT seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the demurrage rate and any flexibility in the laycan dates?

Looking forward to your response.
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Liam,

The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata. We can extend the laycan to 20-28 April 2023. Considering your concerns, I can revise the freight quote to USD 23/MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 23/MT is more acceptable. However, we would prefer a demurrage rate of USD 10,000 per day. Can you accommodate this?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Liam,

I can agree to a demurrage rate of USD 10,000 per day. The freight rate remains at USD 23/MT with the extended laycan of 20-28 April 2023. Please confirm if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

We agree to the terms. Please send over the recap.

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 85,000 MT
Load Port: Richards Bay
Discharge Port: Rotterdam
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 23/MT
Laycan: 20-28 April 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
